title: By the King, a proclamation declaring the Parliament shall be prorogued until the first day of October next
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,
notes: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the eighth day of August 1678.  And in the thirtieth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
